slc.xliff Changelog
===================

slc.xliff 1.1 (2009-06-19)
--------------------------

- code cleanup (gerken)

- fixed tests (gerken)

slc.xliff 1.0 (2008-03-31)
--------------------------

- packaged egg

slc.xliff 1.0b1
---------------

* Added export support for IObjectManager
* Added browser views, actions

slc.xliff 1.0a1
---------------

* port from eITXliffTool to slc.xliff plone3 compatible
